The image is a black and white photograph depicting a city square at sunset or sunrise. The foreground features cobblestone pavement with several birds walking around. Further back, the square is populated with a crowd of people. In the background, the sun is low on the horizon, casting long shadows and creating a silhouette of the surrounding architecture. The buildings have classical European features with prominent towers and intricate roofs. Birds are also visible flying in the sky, which is filled with scattered clouds, enhancing the dramatic effect of the scene. There are no visible signs, text, or diagrams in the image. The overall atmosphere is moody and atmospheric due to the contrast and lighting.
